category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCPublishingTechnicalPortfolio_TCPublishingPage_default_relation
preference.preference_description: Specifies the relation that has to be created when a TCPublishingPage is pasted under a TCPublishingTechnicalPortfolio. The relation specified for this preference will be the default relation that will be created between the TCPublishingPage and the target Portfolio.
